Module rrpss
Package menu

Class MenuItemMgr

java.lang.Object
menu.MenuItemMgr
public class MenuItemMgr extends Object
This is controllers class to manage the menu items.
Author:
Titus, Wei Xiang

    • addNewMenuItem

      public int addNewMenuItem​(int itemId, String name, String description, double price, MenuItem.TYPE_OF_MENU menuType)
      This is a method to add new menu item to the list of menu items.
      Parameters:
      itemId - - the id of the menu item
      name - - the name of the menu item
      description - - the description of the menu item
      price - - the price of the menu item
      menuType - - the type of the menu item
      Returns:
      0 for fail, 1 for successful

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem​(int itemId)
      Method to remove menu item from the list of menu items, based on ID passed in
      Parameters:
      itemId - - the id of the menu item to be removed

      Parameters:

      newName - - the new name of the menu item
